{"name":"Login page check","id":"4028808a1953022d0119531c0e5500c8","number":"120","attachment":null,"description":"

INITIAL REQUIREMENTS:

All tasks for designers on this page should be completed. 

PLAN:

- Open login page
- Page name - should be Login
- Company logo is dislayed in left right corner 
- There a 2 fields on form - Login and Password
- Login button is active
- "Forgot password" link is available 

- List to registration page also needed.
